text.base: You open the logbook. The pages are crisp, despite the damp air. The handwriting is jagged, hurried.

lens.believer: 'Frequency 89.3. It's not static. It's a map.' The coordinates listed point to the center of the lake.
lens.skeptic: Entries suggest severe sleep deprivation. 'The noise stops when I scream.' Classic paranoia symptoms.
lens.haunted: The handwriting changes halfway down the page. It starts to look like yours.

board_updates.label: Tower Logbook
board_updates.description: Maintenance log found in the radio tower shed. Contains impossible dates and erratic ramblings.
